original_text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.
korean_text: 이는 각 사람이 무슨 선을 행하든지 종이나 자유인이나 주께로부터 그대로 받을 줄을 앎이라

sentences.original_text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth
the same shall he receive of the Lord
whether he be bond or free
